channel.title: Moparcraft awards
channel.description:
[ul][li][img]http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/Themes/core/images/pvper.png[/img][/li][/ul] This award will be given to those who have shown their skill in player killing.
[ul][li][img]http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/Themes/core/images/builder.png[/img][/li][/ul] This award will be given to those who have shown their skill in building.
[ul][li][img]http://i.imgur.com/L0P6g.png[/img][/li][/ul] This award will be given to those who demonstrate outstanding knowledge in the field of redstone, and have contributed it to Moparcraft in a positive way.
[ul][li][img]http://i.imgur.com/IUzHV.png[/img][/li][/ul] This award will be given to those who showcase great promise and skill in official spleef events on the server. The user will only hold this so long as he/she is champion, and the award will be stripped if he does not win the next contest.
The server staff is capable of nominating said players and then when Tom_BETA and I approve it, you will be given the award.

item.title: Moparcraft awards
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Updated the thread and we have a new addition to Moparcrafts award tally! For those of you who don’t know, we currently have one privately owned Spleef arena where we’ll hopefully get permission to hold contests. There are plans to build an official arena also which will hopefully be put into effect soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft awards
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:162, topic:430212”][quote author=Classic_ link=topic=532890.msg3952782#msg3952782 date=1332446144]

Didn’t know what other image to use :3

This is better than the “Steve” or the “VIP” award because it show’s that you are a knowledgeable player, and you could ask them, but I think it should not just be for people who have been here since day one, so let’s say you start now and you stay here actively for a long time and help people out, you would get the award. But I do think that you should have a different Icon

This
Would be a good way to keep the award from going to shit by keeping it away from people like me

thank god your back
[/quote]
I think more people enjoyed when I was gone [/quote]
never, I missed you<3

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft awards
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:155, topic:430212”][quote author=Classic_ link=topic=532890.msg3950046#msg3950046 date=1332207762]

Didn’t know what other image to use :3

This is better than the “Steve” or the “VIP” award because it show’s that you are a knowledgeable player, and you could ask them, but I think it should not just be for people who have been here since day one, so let’s say you start now and you stay here actively for a long time and help people out, you would get the award. But I do think that you should have a different Icon
[/quote]And what icon do you have in mind? :P[/quote]
Possibly the MC Logo? Because it symbolises how much experience you have and how much you know. I think that MC Vets should also have a color name, only one color for every single one, and you can’t pick. Or possibly like [VET] Name here?

Read full topic
